name: Forza Horizon 5: Chinese Lucky Stars Car Pack
summary: Collect and drive a curated collection of three Chinese superstar cars and a VW that stole this country’s heart. The Chinese Lucky Stars Car Pack brings everything from SUVs to hot hatches with the 2022 Lynk & Co 05+, 2023 MG Cyberster, 2012 Volkswagen Santana and the 2022 Wuling Hongguang Mini EV
